channel.title: Introduction on Nitro CI
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on Nitro CI

item.title: Sample Page
item.description: The theme supports two different kinds of menus. File-tree menu is the default one and does not require further configuration to work. If you want full control about your menu the bundle menu is a powerful option to accomplish it. File-tree menu Bundle menu More menu Extra Header Menu File-tree menu As the name already suggests, the file tree menu builds a menu from the file system structure of the content folder.
